articles.author: David L. Stern, Francesca Ebel, Chico Harlan
articles.title: Russia’s gas supply to Europe halted after Ukraine transit deal expires - The Washington Post
articles.description: Ukraine, which had allowed Russian oil and gas to cross its territory to serve Europe while fighting Moscow’s invasion since 2022, refused to renew the deal.
articles.content: MUKACHEVO, Ukraine The flow of natural gas from Russia to Europe was suspended Wednesday after Ukraine said it would not renew a deal allowing Russian gas to transit its territory, ending an energy s… [+6700 chars]
